nodes.id: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

zh-cn: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 2014年中华民国地方公职人员选举的一部分，是首次将直辖市长、县市长选举合并举行。
description.en: Part of the 2014 Taiwanese local elections, and the first time that municipal and county/city mayoral elections were held simultaneously.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一。
description.en: A major political party in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一。
description.en: A major political party in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政党之一。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 指不隶属于任何政党的政治人物。
description.en: Refers to politicians not affiliated with any political party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物及医师，2014年当选台北市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician and physician, elected Mayor of Taipei in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党党员，2014年参选台北市市长落败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, a member of the Kuomintang, who ran unsuccessfully for Mayor of Taipei in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年当选连任新北市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, re-elected as Mayor of New Taipei City in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党党员，2014年参选新北市市长落败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, a member of the Democratic Progressive Party, who ran unsuccessfully for Mayor of New Taipei City in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年当选桃园市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, elected Mayor of Taoyuan in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任桃园县县长，2014年参选改制后的桃园市市长落败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then Magistrate of Taoyuan County, who ran unsuccessfully for Mayor of the newly upgraded Taoyuan City in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年当选台中市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, elected Mayor of Taichung in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任台中市市长，2014年竞选连任失败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then Mayor of Taichung, who was unsuccessful in his re-election campaign in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年当选连任台南市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, re-elected as Mayor of Tainan in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾学者，2014年代表中国国民党参选台南市市长落败。
description.en: Taiwanese academic who represented the Kuomintang and ran unsuccessfully for Mayor of Tainan in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年当选连任高雄市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, re-elected as Mayor of Kaohsiung in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年代表中国国民党参选高雄市市长落败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician who represented the Kuomintang and ran unsuccessfully for Mayor of Kaohsiung in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician who ran unsuccessfully as an independent for Magistrate of Hsinchu County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician, elected Mayor of Hsinchu City in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician, re-elected as Magistrate of Chiayi County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician who represented the Kuomintang and ran unsuccessfully for Magistrate of Chiayi County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician and physician, elected Mayor of Chiayi City in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician who represented the Kuomintang and ran unsuccessfully for Mayor of Chiayi City in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician, elected Magistrate of Pingtung County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician, re-elected as Magistrate of Yilan County in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师及政治人物，2014年代表中国国民党参选宜兰县县长落败。
description.en: Taiwanese physician and politician who represented the Kuomintang and ran unsuccessfully for Magistrate of Yilan County in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年以无党籍身份当选连任花莲县县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, re-elected as an independent for Magistrate of Hualien County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician who represented the Kuomintang and ran unsuccessfully for Magistrate of Hualien County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician, re-elected as Magistrate of Taitung County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician who represented the Democratic Progressive Party and ran unsuccessfully for Magistrate of Taitung County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician, elected Magistrate of Penghu County in 2014.

description.en: Taiwanese politician who represented the Kuomintang and ran unsuccessfully for Magistrate of Penghu County in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2014年以无党籍身份当选金门县县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, elected as an independent for Magistrate of Kinmen County in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任金门县县长，2014年竞选连任失败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then Magistrate of Kinmen County, who was unsuccessful in his re-election campaign in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物及医师，2014年当选连江县县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician and physician, elected Magistrate of Lienchiang County in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任连江县县长，2014年竞选连任失败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then Magistrate of Lienchiang County, who was unsuccessful in his re-election campaign in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 发生于2014年台湾桃园县的贪腐案件，涉及县府官员收受贿赂。
description.en: A corruption case in Taoyuan County, Taiwan, in 2014, involving bribery of county government officials.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任桃园县副县长，因八德合宜住宅弊案被解职。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then Deputy Magistrate of Taoyuan County, who was dismissed due to the Bade affordable housing scandal.

description.zh-cn: 2014年于高雄市发生的一系列石化气爆炸事件。
description.en: A series of petrochemical gas explosions that occurred in Kaohsiung City in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，原为中国国民党提名的基隆市长候选人，后遭撤销提名，以无党籍身份参选落败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, originally the KMT's nominee for Keelung Mayor, whose nomination was later revoked. He ran unsuccessfully as an independent.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前新竹市市长，2014年以无党籍身份参选市长落败。
description.en: Taiwanese politician and former Mayor of Hsinchu City, who ran unsuccessfully for mayor as an independent in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任花莲县县长傅崐萁的配偶，为因应官司变数同时登记参选2014年花莲县县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, spouse of then Hualien County Magistrate Fu Kun-chi, who also registered to run for Magistrate in 2014 as a contingency for her husband's legal issues.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前中华民国副总统，中国国民党荣誉主席，连胜文之父。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Vice President of the Republic of China, and Honorary Chairman of the Kuomintang. He is the father of Lien Sheng-wen.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在此次选举中席次大幅减少，从15席锐减至6席，遭遇重大挫败。
description.en: The Kuomintang suffered a major defeat in this election, with its number of seats drastically reduced from 15 to 6.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党在此次选举中取得重大胜利，席次从6席大幅增加至13席。
description.en: The Democratic Progressive Party achieved a major victory in this election, increasing its number of seats from 6 to 13.

relationships.source: 柯文哲

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲以无党籍身份参选并当选2014年台北市长。
description.en: Ko Wen-je ran and was elected as Mayor of Taipei in 2014 as an independent.

relationships.source: 民主进步党

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党在2014年台北市长选举中采取“在野整合”策略，未提名本党候选人，转而支持无党籍的柯文哲。
description.en: In the 2014 Taipei mayoral election, the Democratic Progressive Party adopted a strategy of 'pan-green integration', not nominating its own candidate and instead supporting the independent Ko Wen-je.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲在2014年选举中当选台北市市长。
description.en: Ko Wen-je was elected Mayor of Taipei in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 连胜文

description.zh-cn: 连胜文为中国国民党党员，并代表该党参选2014年台北市长。
description.en: Lien Sheng-wen is a member of the Kuomintang and represented the party in the 2014 Taipei mayoral election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 连胜文在2014年台北市长选举中落败。
description.en: Lien Sheng-wen was defeated in the 2014 Taipei mayoral election.

relationships.source: 连胜文

description.zh-cn: 连胜文是连战的儿子。
description.en: Lien Sheng-wen is the son of Lien Chan.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 朱立伦在2014年选举中成功连任新北市市长。
description.en: Eric Chu was successfully re-elected as Mayor of New Taipei City in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 游锡堃在2014年新北市长选举中落败。
description.en: You Si-kun was defeated in the 2014 New Taipei City mayoral election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 郑文灿在2014年选举中当选桃园市市长。
description.en: Cheng Wen-tsan was elected Mayor of Taoyuan in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 时任桃园县长的吴志扬在2014年首届桃园市长选举中落败。
description.en: Then-Magistrate of Taoyuan County, Wu Chih-yang, was defeated in the inaugural 2014 Taoyuan City mayoral election.

relationships.source: 八德合宜住宅弊案

description.zh-cn: 八德合宜住宅弊案在其副手叶世文涉案后爆发，对吴志扬的选情造成了一定的影响。
description.en: The Bade affordable housing scandal broke after his deputy Yeh Shih-wen was implicated, which had a certain impact on Wu Chih-yang's election campaign.

relationships.source: 八德合宜住宅弊案

description.zh-cn: 叶世文因卷入八德合宜住宅弊案而被解职。
description.en: Yeh Shih-wen was dismissed from his post due to his involvement in the Bade affordable housing scandal.

relationships.source: 叶世文

description.zh-cn: 叶世文曾任吴志扬的副手，担任桃园县副县长。
description.en: Yeh Shih-wen served as Wu Chih-yang's deputy, as the Deputy Magistrate of Taoyuan County.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 林佳龙在2014年选举中当选台中市市长。
description.en: Lin Chia-lung was elected Mayor of Taichung in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 时任台中市长的胡志强在2014年竞选连任失败。
description.en: Then-Mayor of Taichung, Jason Hu, was defeated in his re-election campaign in 2014.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 赖清德在2014年选举中成功连任台南市市长。
description.en: Lai Ching-te was successfully re-elected as Mayor of Tainan in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 黄秀霜在2014年台南市长选举中落败。
description.en: Huang Hsiu-shuang was defeated in the 2014 Tainan mayoral election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 陈菊在2014年选举中成功连任高雄市市长。
description.en: Chen Chu was successfully re-elected as Mayor of Kaohsiung in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年台湾高雄气爆事故

description.zh-cn: 2014年台湾高雄气爆事故对时任市长陈菊的竞选连任选情造成一定的影响。
description.en: The 2014 Kaohsiung gas explosions had a certain impact on the re-election campaign of then-Mayor Chen Chu.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 杨秋兴在2014年高雄市长选举中落败。
description.en: Yang Chiu-hsing was defeated in the 2014 Kaohsiung mayoral election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 林右昌在2014年选举中当选基隆市市长。
description.en: Lin Yu-chang was elected Mayor of Keelung in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 中国国民党

description.zh-cn: 由于黄景泰涉入关说建案，中国国民党于2014年7月9日撤销其基隆市长候选人提名。
description.en: Due to his involvement in a lobbying case, the Kuomintang revoked Huang Ching-tai's nomination for Keelung Mayor on July 9, 2014.

relationships.source: 中国国民党

description.zh-cn: 在撤销黄景泰的提名后，中国国民党征召谢立功参选基隆市长。
description.en: After revoking Huang Ching-tai's nomination, the Kuomintang recruited Hsieh Li-kung to run for Mayor of Keelung.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 谢立功在2014年基隆市长选举中落败。
description.en: Hsieh Li-kung was defeated in the 2014 Keelung mayoral election.

relationships.source: 民主进步党

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党支持以无党籍身份参选2014年新竹县县长的郑永金。
description.en: The Democratic Progressive Party supported Cheng Yung-chin, who ran as an independent, in the 2014 Hsinchu County magistrate election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 邱镜淳在2014年选举中成功连任新竹县县长。
description.en: Chiu Ching-chun was successfully re-elected as Magistrate of Hsinchu County in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 林智坚在2014年选举中当选新竹市市长。
description.en: Lin Chih-chien was elected Mayor of Hsinchu City in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 时任新竹市长的许明财在2014年竞选连任失败。
description.en: Then-Mayor of Hsinchu City, Hsu Ming-tsai, was defeated in his re-election campaign in 2014.

relationships.source: 蔡仁坚

description.zh-cn: 前市长蔡仁坚以无党籍身份参选，吸收了部分国民党支持者的票源，间接导致了许明财的落败。
description.en: Former mayor Tsai Jen-chien's independent candidacy attracted some votes from KMT supporters, indirectly contributing to Hsu Ming-tsai's defeat.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 徐耀昌在2014年选举中当选苗栗县县长。
description.en: Hsu Yao-chang was elected Magistrate of Miaoli County in the 2014 election.

description.zh-cn: 魏明谷在2014年选举中当选彰化县县长。
description.en: Wei Ming-ku was elected Magistrate of Changhua County in the 2014 election.

description.zh-cn: 李进勇在2014年选举中当选云林县县长。
description.en: Lee Chin-yung was elected Magistrate of Yunlin County in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 亲民党

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁在2014年花莲县长选举中获得亲民党背书。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi was endorsed by the People First Party in the 2014 Hualien County magistrate election.

relationships.source: 傅崐萁

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚是傅崐萁的配偶。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei is the spouse of Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 黄健庭在2014年选举中成功连任台东县县长。
description.en: Justin Huang was successfully re-elected as Magistrate of Taitung County in the 2014 election.

description.zh-cn: 陈光复在2014年选举中当选澎湖县县长。
description.en: Chen Kuang-fu was elected Magistrate of Penghu County in the 2014 election.

description.zh-cn: 陈福海在2014年选举中当选金门县县长。
description.en: Chen Fu-hai was elected Magistrate of Kinmen County in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 亲民党

description.zh-cn: 陈福海在2014年金门县长选举中获得亲民党背书。
description.en: Chen Fu-hai was endorsed by the People First Party in the 2014 Kinmen County magistrate election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 时任金门县长的李沃士在2014年竞选连任失败。
description.en: Then-Magistrate of Kinmen County, Li Wo-shi, was defeated in his re-election campaign in 2014.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 刘增应在2014年选举中当选连江县县长。
description.en: Liu Tseng-ying was elected Magistrate of Lienchiang County in the 2014 election.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 时任连江县长的杨绥生在2014年竞选连任失败。
description.en: Then-Magistrate of Lienchiang County, Yang Sui-sheng, was defeated in his re-election campaign in 2014.

relationships.source: 刘增应

description.zh-cn: 同属中国国民党的刘增应与杨绥生在2014年连江县长选举中互为竞争对手。
description.en: Liu Tseng-ying and Yang Sui-sheng, both members of the KMT, were opponents in the 2014 Lienchiang County magistrate election.
